attributes.action: table a vote of 'no confidence' in Michael Martin (The Speaker)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker should go. He's long past his sell-by date and there's now a nasty smell.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
